document.full_text: as, lebanon  - four protesters were killed and 11 wounded in a shooting incident at the lebanese-israeli border where palestinians were demonstrating on sunday, security sources said.
document.title: four killed in lebanon-israel border shooting: source
lines_and_colors: as, lebanon  - four protesters were killed and 11 wounded in a shooting incident at the lebanese-israeli border where palestinians were demonstrating on sunday, security sources said.
